headline: PulteGroup (PHM) Snaps 3-Day Losses on Buy Reco, Higher Price Target
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks with Surprising Gains. PulteGroup, Inc. (NYSE:PHM) is one of Tuesday’s top performers. PulteGroup snapped a three-day losing streak on Tuesday, jumping 11.52 percent to close at $121.17 apiece as investors took heart from an investment firm’s rating and price target upgrade for its stock.
